column4: I'm guessing he means kill gnome-volume-control; 'killall gnome-volume-control'
gnome-volume-control: no process found   (do you have this process running by default?)
Interesting. That was just a guess; since i'm assuming he meant that that program is capturing the keys. try 'ps aux | grep volume' '
http://paste.ubuntu.com/578146/  seems to be referring to physical volumes (disks?)
